text_block_list.text: (Woosh…… woosh……)
A refreshing breeze in the seaside night. The pleasant sound of the waves…
So peaceful, so far away from the hustle and bustle of the city. How on earth did I end up here……?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: YAHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey hey hey!! This ain't no time to be playing dead, trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: On your feet! Stand up! It's time for you to wake up!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huuh? The heck, you don't remember?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: The day that darkness covered the world… The day nearly all hope was snuffed from these lands.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But as luck would have it, earth had a savior in lord Gold Ship…!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: She crossed the oceans, she crossed the mountains, in search of Eden… All to save this world……!
The word "Eden" jogged some vague memory…
― Right, it was a few days prior.
When I was walking, thinking about the Twinkles Series which was about to start…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, trainer, hear me out!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I wanted to take a peek at the geological strata so I starting drilling a hole in this field, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And would you know it, I happened upon this Enigmatic Tome!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: "Eden, that is, the utopia that only horsegirls of great power can reach……"

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: "Goldship, mightiest of horsegirls, hear. Aim to reach Eden — by Enigmatic Tome"

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Don't that mean I was chosen by Eden?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wooooooo! It lights the fire in meeee!
"by Enigmatic Tome", really? She thinks it would say that?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: The heck!? You don't understand the worth of little old Golshi, desired even by Eden, do you!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I didn't wanna get rough, but you leave me no choice—

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ……And, yoop!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Don't you worry. I ain't gonna slide you in my menchi-katsu like a piece of cabbage.
And that was how we ended up here…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: So, 'bout our next course of action—

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: … You have one of those cardinal clocks they call a compass?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Remember? You lost all our food and your smartphone while swimming in the ocean?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: So never mind Eden, I don't even know which way home is.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I mean, maybe I could think about spending the rest of my life here, but…
How in blazes has it come to this…!!
